content.question: An object with an unknown initial velocity has a constant acceleration with components <math alttext="a sub x, equals 8 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.30em"></mspace><mtext></mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>m/s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="a sub y equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is a possible expression for the position of this object, in meters, for both the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> directions as functions of time?

choices.label: <math alttext="x equals 8, t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x equals 8, t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y equals 8, t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x equals 8, t squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y equals 8, t squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x equals 4, t squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y equals 8, t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x equals 4, t squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y equals 4, t squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="x equals 4, t squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y equals 8, t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
